ai.summary: Crag Top Trail is a short, easy 3.4 km hike in the UK designed for beginners and families. The route combines grassy footpaths with occasional rocky sections and mild elevation, delivering pleasant views with light exertion.
ai.terrain_summary: The trail generally follows a well-defined path. Expect a mix of smooth grassy sections, compacted earth, and short, uneven rocky patches near exposed crags. Elevation gain is mild, with a few gentle rises and optional viewpoints along the way. The surface can be slippery when wet, so sturdy footwear is advised.
ai.safety_notes: - Check weather and daylight hours before you go. - Stay on the marked path; rocky sections can be unstable. - Wear sturdy, waterproof footwear. - Bring water and snacks. - In the UK, weather can change quickly; carry a lightweight layer. - If conditions are poor or visibility is low, postpone the hike. - Inform someone of your plans or hike with a partner.
ai.best_seasons: All year, with the best conditions typically in spring through autumn; in winter be prepared for colder weather and shorter daylight hours.

seo.title: Crag Top Trail – Easy 3.4 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Plan your Crag Top Trail hike in the UK. An easy 3.4 km route with gentle terrain, safety tips, gear recommendations, and best seasons for hiking.
